translation.Name: 5 Kingdoms
translation.header.place.you: Place the first card of the deck in the Alkane square
translation.header.place.player: {player} places the first card of the deck in the Alkane square
translation.header.pick.you: Choose the banner you want to collect
translation.header.recruit.you: You must recruit a character or <0>discard all</0>
translation.header.influence.you: You increase your influence in the {kingdom} Kingdom
translation.header.influence.player: {player} increases his influence with the {kingdom} Kingdom
translation.header.influence.imperial.you: Place {number, plural, one{the card in the column} other{the cards in the columns}} of your choice
translation.header.influence.imperial.player: {player} places the {number, plural, one{card in any column} other{cards in any columns}}
translation.header.refill: New cards are added to the Alkane square
translation.header.activate.you: Choose which character to activate first
translation.header.activate.player: {player} chooses which character to activate first
translation.header.warrior.you: Warrior: steal <0/> or destroy a character
translation.header.warrior.player: Warrior : {player} steals <0/> or destroys a character
translation.header.sorceress.you: Witch: recruit or influence a card from the discard pile
translation.header.sorceress.player: Witch: {player} recruits or influences a card from the discard pile
translation.help.token.count.you: You have {number, plural, one{# Castle token} other{# Castle tokens}}.
translation.help.token.count.player: {player} has {number, plural, one{# Castle token} other{# Castle tokens}}.
translation.help.token.purpose: At the end of the game (when the deck of banner cards is empty), the player with the most Castle tokens wins.
translation.help.throne.effect: When you reach 3 influences in the {kingdom}, earn <0/><0/>.
translation.help.concile.purpose: You can have 4 characters in your council, around your <0>Throne Room</0> card.
translation.help.card.throne.effect: <0>During the game</0>, when you influence the 3rd {kingdom} Kingdom banner: earn <1/><1/>.
translation.help.card.king.effect: <0>At the end of the game</0>, if you strictly possess the most influences in this King's Kingdom: win <1/><1/><1/>.
translation.help.card.queen.effect: <0>During the game</0>, when you influence this Queen's 3rd, 4th and 5th Kingdom banners: win <1/>.
translation.help.card.sorceress.effect: <0>During the game</0>, when you influence the 3rd and 5th banners of this Witch's Kingdom: look at all the cards in the discard pile, choose 1 card you can <0>Recruit</0> or <0>Influence</0>.
translation.help.card.warrior.effect: <0>During the game</0>, when you influence this Warrior's 4th Kingdom banner: steal <1/> from your opponent or destroy an opposing Character or Titan and place it in the discard pile.
translation.help.card.titan.effect2: <0>During the game</0>, if you recruit a 5th different Titan: you win the game instantly.
translation.help.card.papess.effect: <0>During the game</0>, when you influence the 4th banner of any Kingdom: win <1/><1/>.
translation.help.card.monk.effect1: <0>When Recruited</0>, steal <1/> from your opponent or destroy an opposing Character or Titan and place it in the discard pile.
translation.help.card.monk.effect2: <0>At the end of the game</0>, if you have strictly the most Warriors and Warrior Monks, steal <1/><1/> from your opponent.
translation.help.card.gaia.effect: <0>At the end of the game</0>, if you strictly own the most Titans, counting Gaia: win <1/>.
translation.help.card.colonel.effect1: <0>During the game</0>, when you create a line of 5 influences: win <1/>.
translation.help.card.colonel.effect2: <0>At the end of the game</0>, if you strictly own the most influence lines: win <1/><1/>.
translation.help.card.general.effect: <0>During the game</0>, when you create a line of 5 influences: immediately play again one turn.
translation.help.card.captain.effect1: <0>When Recruited</0>, earn <1/> per Kingdom of which you have strictly the most influence.
translation.help.card.captain.effect2: <0>At the end of the game</0>, earn <1/> per Kingdom of which you have strictly the most influence.
translation.help.card.marshal.effect: <0>At the end of the game</0>, if you strictly own the most Imperial Order Characters: win <1/><1/><1/>.
translation.help.deck.count: There are {number, plural, one{# card} other{# cards}} left in the deck.
translation.help.discard.count: There are {number, plural, one{# card} other{# cards}} in the discard pile.
translation.help.card.alkane: This card is in the <0>Alkane square</0>.
translation.help.alkane.purpose:
On your turn, place the first card of the deck, face-down, on an empty Alkane square.
The slot must be orthogonally adjacent to a card already present, and the square cannot exceed 3x3 in size.
If the card is placed next to a card from the same banner, you recover all adjacent cards from close to that banner.
Otherwise, you recover an adjacent card, and all the cards of the same Banner as it.
translation.help.card.hand.you: This card is in your hand.
translation.help.titan.column.purpose:
This column is used to place recruited Titans.

You can win de game by recruiting 5 Titans!
translation.help.card.influence.you: This card is in your {kingdom} Kingdom Influence column.
translation.help.card.influence.player: This card is {player}'s Influence column on {kingdom} Kingdom.
translation.help.influence.you: You have {number, plural, one{# Influence} other{# Influences}} on {kingdom} Kindgom.
translation.help.influence.player: {player} has {number, plural, one{# Influence} other{# Influences}} on {kingdom} Kingdom.
translation.tuto.goal: In this game, you'll recruit characters and gain influence among the <0>5 Kingdoms of the Alkane world</0>, in order to conquer more Castles than your opponent.
translation.tuto.castle:
Here are the <0>Castle tokens</0>.
At the end of the game, <0>the player with the most Castles wins</0>.
translation.tuto.bannerdeck:
This is the deck of <0>Banner cards</0>.
<0>The game ends when this deck is empty</0>.
translation.tuto.banner: Each of the 5 Kingdoms has its own banner:
translation.tuto.other.banner: In addition to the 5 Kingdoms, there are 2 other banners:
translation.tuto.alkane:
This is the <0>Alkane square</0>.
On your turn, you must take the first card from the deck and add it, face-down, to this square.
translation.tuto.place: Take the first card from the deck and place it here.
translation.sign-in-to-chat: You must sign in to chat
translation.failure.dialog.network: An action could not be completed and was canceled. Are you still connected to the Internet?
translation.failure.dialog.play: The action you played is not allowed.
translation.failure.dialog.play2: If the problem persists, try to <0>reload the game</0>
translation.failure.dialog.undo: The other players have already played, your move could not be canceled.
translation.Move not expected in the tutorial: Move not expected in the tutorial
translation.failure.dialog.tutorial: You will soon be free to make your own choices! Let us show you the last information...
translation.giveup.title: Give up the game
translation.giveup.robot: You will be eliminated and replaced by a robot playing at random.
translation.giveup.competitive: The game will count as an overall loss.
translation.giveup.friendly: Your friends will be able to finish the game without you.
translation.giveup.tournament: You will also abandon the tournament.
translation.giveup.last.choice: You can cancel the game, claim victory, or complete the game against a random robot if you like.
translation.giveup.last.choice.competitive: If you choose to finish the game against the robot, you'll still win the ranking points at the end of the game.
translation.quit.player: {player} left the game and conceded victory.
translation.quit.player.ejected: {player} has been excluded from the game.
translation.quit.you.ejected: You've been excluded from the game for having overstayed your thinking time.
translation.eject.dialog.p2: Beyond {duration} you will be allowed to eject them and continue the game.
translation.eject.dialog.p3: If you don‚Äôt think they are coming back, you have the option to eject them from the game.
translation.fs.dialog.p1: This game is designed for landscape mode, we recommend you flip your screen.
translation.result.comp.tie.you: Tie! You share victory with {tied, plural, one{#other player} other{#other players}}.
translation.result.comp.tie.all: Tie! The players share the victory.
translation.result.score.victory: Congratulations, you win the game with {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}!
translation.result.score.winner: {player} wins the game with {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}
translation.result.score.tie.you: Tie! With {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}, you share victory with {tied, plural, one{# other player} other{#other players}}.
translation.result.score.tie.other: Tie! {tied} players share victory with {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}.
translation.result.score.tie.all: Tie! Players share victory with {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}.
translation.game.over.concede.victory: You win the game by forfeit!
translation.time.title: Players thinking time
translation.tuto.over:
Congratulations, you've completed the tutorial!
Ready to play with other players?
